name: nitrous_endpoint
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool atmosphere_nitrous_oxide_levels.
Tool description: This API provides on a monthly basis, the amount of nitrous oxide in the atmosphere from 2001 to the present. Expressed as a mole fraction in dry air, parts per million (ppm).
API description: Sends a GET request to the Nitrous Oxide API and returns the response data.

nitrous.description: An optional query parameter to filter the results based on nitrous oxide levels.
